roleset.name: chastise
roleset.note: REBUKE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'rebuke' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 33, Framenet entry Judgement. (from rebuke.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: Meanwhile, business and government leaders rebuked the computer makers, and fretted about the broader statement the companies' actions make about Japanese cutthroat pricing.

example.name: ARG2
example.text: President Obama rebuked Donald Trump for his renewed call to ban Muslim immigrants.
example.arg: for his renewed call to ban Muslim immigrants.
